citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany the APHIS Official during the inspection process at 11:30am on
Thursday, December 5, 2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on the door and calling the
phone number on file. The inspector waited approximately 30 minutes in the driveway before leaving. Failure to provide
access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to
comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany the APHIS Official during the inspection process at 11:30am on 
Thursday, December 5, 2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on the door and calling the 
phone number on file. The inspector waited approximately 30 minutes in the driveway before leaving. Failure to provide 
access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to 
comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
